attributes.name: accept-charset
attributes.description: Character encodings to use for form submission

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: URL to use for form submission

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Default setting for autofill feature for controls in the form

attributes.name: enctype
attributes.description: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: Variant to use for form submission

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of form to use in the document.forms API

attributes.name: novalidate
attributes.description: Bypass form control validation for form submission
